
account:email?action=read
account:email?action=manage
account:repo?action=manage
account:email
account:repo
account?attr=email

blob:image/png
blob:*/*
blob:image/*
blob?accept=image/png

identity:handle
identity:*
identity?attr=handle

include:app.example.authBasics
include:com.example.bar
include:com.example.baz?aud=did:web:example.com%23my_service
include:com.example.baz?aud=did:web:example.com#my_service
include?nsid=com.example.baz
include?aud=did:web:example.com%23my_service&nsid=com.example.baz
include:com.example.calendar.auth

repo:com.example.foo
repo:com.example.foo?action=create&action=update
repo:*?action=create
repo:*
repo?collection=com.example.foo&action=create&action=update&action=delete
repo?action=create&collection=com.example.foo&collection=com.example.bar

rpc:com.example.service?aud=did:web:example.com%23service_id
rpc?lxm=com.example.method1&aud=*
rpc:com.example.method1?aud=*
rpc?lxm=com.example.method1&lxm=com.example.method2&aud=did:web:example.com%23service_id
rpc?aud=*&lxm=com.example.method1&lxm=com.example.method2
rpc:com.example.query?aud=did:web:api.example.com%23api_example
rpc?aud=did%3Aweb%3Aapi.example.com%23frag&lxm=com.example.query&lxm=com.example.procedure


# examples from specification text 
repo:app.example.profile
repo:app.example.profile?action=create&action=update&action=delete
repo?collection=app.example.profile&collection=app.example.post
repo:*
repo:*?action=delete
rpc:app.example.moderation.createReport?aud=*
rpc?lxm=*&aud=did:web:api.example.com%23svc_appview
blob:*/*
blob?accept=video/*&accept=text/html
account:email
account:repo?action=manage
identity:handle
identity:*
identity:*?
rpc?lxm=*&aud=did:web:api.example.com%23svc_appview
blob?accept=video/*&accept=text/html
repo:app.example.profile?action=create&action=update&action=delete
include:app.example.authFull?aud=did:web:api.example.com%23svc_chat
